name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 17, Shanghai. The blogger used the 9 yuan hourly wage of a roadside security guard to test his purchasing power in a supermarket. His goal was to buy rice, flour, oil, meat, eggs, milk, fruits and vegetables. He found that he could not afford most fruits and vegetables, bagged rice, oil, etc. In the end, he bought a bag of milk, 0.1 kg of rice, two potatoes, 4 duck wings, a pear and two eggs, spending a total of 10 yuan. The blogger joked, "9 yuan bought so many things. Social development is really good. Great praise."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 16, medical staff at Shanwei People's Hospital held up banners reading "We want to eat" while collectively demanding their wages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 18, Japan. A Chinese man saw a Japanese skateboarder on the steps, so he kept cursing him, "Fall him to death, fall him to death." When the other person fell down by mistake, the man and his friend laughed happily.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 18 (Released) Jiangxi. Students dressed in Red Army uniforms performed a scene of beating landlords during the land reform period. The students in the audience applauded. Currently, the video has been deleted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 18, Putin met with representatives of BRICS countries at the presidential residence and compared China to the sun. He said, "The United States has tried to stop China's development through various means, but this is like preventing the sun from rising, which is impossible." Putin also said, "Australia, Japan and New Zealand are like puppies tied by the United States.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, it was reported online that Feihe milk powder was cooperating with Japan Kyowa Fermentation, which triggered a boycott by netizens. Netizens said that they would resolutely boycott Feihe milk powder and not gamble with their children's health. On the 18th, Feihe Dairy issued a statement: it had reported the case and the cooperation with Japan Kyowa Fermentation was only for technical exchanges.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, Sima Nan was intercepted by staff during a live broadcast on Henan Pangdonglai, sparking heated discussions. On October 14, Sima Nan responded to one of the netizens who mocked him: "I finally understand that it is safe to scold Sima Nan. It doesn't matter how you scold him. Why don't you scold someone else? You don't even dare to mention the name of the person you hate in your heart."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 19 (Released) Hebei. An old man with festering body was lying on the bed. The room was full of debris and garbage, flies were flying everywhere and the stench was overwhelming. A kind man brought some food to the old man. The old man said he didn't know what was going on and could only lie on the bed. A netizen replied in the comment area, "Didn't the village committee help him?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 18, it was reported that on the eve of Halloween this year, the Shanghai police strengthened security measures in Huangpu District and strictly prohibited makeup that especially involved horror and violent elements. The police implemented the principle of "whoever finds, whoever takes away, whoever removes the makeup" to ensure that there are no illegal costumes. Foreign media analyzed that this move may be to prevent the occurrence of similar incidents in Urumqi Zhonglu in 2022, aimed at strengthening social management and restricting Western festival activities.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
A deputy mayor of a prefecture-level city, with 3.1 billion assets, 1,021 properties, and 18 company shares. In the reports of Chinese official media, he is the Jixi corrupt official; however, he insists that he is a wronged dissident.
Under which face is the real Li Chuanliang? How does he tell his story? As a former local senior official, what explosive information does he have about the Chinese officialdom? How does he view the Chinese system?
Welcome to watch Mr. Li's interview with Li Chuanliang, the person involved in the Jixi "3.1 billion corruption case": How did I go from an "anti-corruption fighter" to a "huge corrupt official"?

@lichuanliang63

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, the international version of the two-dimensional mobile game "Blue Files" under the Korean game company NEXON listed Hong Kong and Taiwan separately in the three-year live broadcast, which caused dissatisfaction and boycotts among many players. NEXON has not yet responded to this matter, but the national version issued a statement as soon as the incident fermented, stating that Taiwan and Hong Kong are always an inseparable part of the People's Republic of China.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On October 18, Hefei police released a video saying "Happy New Year everyone"
According to a report on September 29, a woman in Xi'an was detained by the police for releasing a video saying "It's snowing in Xi'an".

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 16, Chinese Ambassador to the United Nations Fu Cong said: We are all human beings, why do we have to endure such suffering when we are born in Gaza? Two million people have been struggling on the brink of death for more than a year. How long will it take before we can hope to live?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 19, near Chongqing Times Square, a man in red wielded a kitchen knife and slashed at another man in black. The man's face was covered in blood, and the people around him screamed. According to an insider, the customer came into the store to buy water, and the customer said he paid, but the boss said he didn't, so the boss slashed the customer with a kitchen knife.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
At present, there are still netizens on the social platform who believe that former Hamas leader Sinwar is still alive and think that the Israeli report is untrue.
Netizens replied "TikTok has resurrected Sinwar again"
